ticket_id='CHR-268AC4B5' program_id='CBSTM03A' section='purpose' issue_type=<IssueType.VAGUE: 'VAGUE'> description="The purpose summary is overly detailed with implementation specifics (e.g., 'loading transactions into a 2D table') rather than clearly stating the core business function.
